game_description: Welcome to Spazers! Spazers is an open world game where you can play with your friends and explore many different planets! Do you want some style? then go on into the Star Shop and get yourself amazing cosmetic Options! There are Gamemodes that you and your friends can play by the rules, or make your own rules! From us at SpazeStudios - Have fun!
